```r
info = uniInfo(X,y,loo = TRUE)
f = matrix(rep(NA,n*p),n,p)
for(j in 1:p){
  x_temp = cbind(rep(1,n),X[,j])
  f[,j] = lm.fit(x_temp,y)$fitted.values
}
```

```r
info = uniInfo(X,y,loo = TRUE)
f = matrix(rep(NA,n*p),n,p)
for(j in 1:p){
  x_temp = cbind(rep(1,n),X[,j])
  f[,j] = lm.fit(x_temp,y)$fitted.values
}
```
